snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo announced an agreement to provide storage space for the boats of the Maid of the Mist Corporation, which lost its Canadian storage base this year.
abstract: Maid of the Mist, longtime boat tour operator in Niagara Falls, NY, will continue to operate, despite having lost its boat storage and fueling area when it lost contract to run tours on the Canadian side of the falls; state Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation, along with New York Power Authority, will invest $32 million in former Schoellkopf Power Station to adapt the site for boat storage in the Niagara Gorge.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo announced an agreement to provide storage space for the boats of the Maid of the Mist Corporation, which lost its Canadian storage base this year.

headline.seo: Maid of the Mist Corporation Signs Agreement to Continue Niagara Tours
headline.main: Deal Allows Company to Continue Niagara Boat Tours
headline.print_headline: Deal Allows Company to Continue Niagara Boat Tours

keywords.value: Maid of the Mist Steamboats Co
keywords.name: organizations
